Text: Geico Rate Quote Dear Jonathan McKay Here is a copy of your GEICO General rate quote to hang on to Total Premium for a month policy Click here to see the details of the coverages and premium Click here to BUY this policy ONLINE It is easy to start your policy right at our web site To activate your policy by phone call hours a day Please reference this number when you call If you have questions about your quote please email us at Are you ready to switch to GEICO Be one of the more than drivers just like you who will switch to GEICO this week The GEICO Direct Difference Every minute of every day drivers all across the country switch to GEICO Car insurance Why GEICO increases efficiency and the level of service by cutting out the middleman Eliminating unnecessary layers and expenses means you deal directly with the source GEICOs convenient Payment Plans you can choose to pay your premium in full or select one of our payment plans to make our bill if not the highlight of your day at least more convenient than others you may receive And now you can even receive your bill electronically via email GEICOs web site wwwgeicocom provides you with a convenient way to access your account pay your bill online change your policy and learn about our services GEICO provides fast efficient nationwide claim handling GEICO offers renewal to more than of it policyholders each year GEICO has numerous moneysaving discounts available Government Employees Insurance Company GEICO General Insurance Company GEICO Indemnity Company GEICO Casualty Company One GEICO Plaza Washington DC wwwgeicocom
